overview: Tu's troupe visits a countryside hoping to earn some money back after a big contract collapses. Anh Tu is a funny person, so he is loved and enthusiastically helped by the children here.  By chance, he meets Ngoc Linh – a childhood friend who is now a teacher. In the village, a rich wood merchant has been keeping an eye on her for a long time and intends to play a trick to steal her. Will Ngoc Linh escape his evil scheme and the children in the poor countryside have the pleasure of learning drama?
title: River Of Laughter
